Name: Tongue Twister
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: This creamy, sweet Tiki number is laced with three different spirits.
History: Adapted from a drink featured in May 2006 on tikibartv.com
Nutrition: One serving of Tongue Twister contains 288 calories
